direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods retrieve properties associated with options, but one uses an Option object and the other uses a String identifier.
Both methods retrieve values associated with options, but getOptionProperties retrieves properties while getOptionValue retrieves a single value.
Both methods retrieve values associated with options, but getOptionProperties retrieves properties while getOptionValues retrieves multiple values.
Both methods process options to retrieve values, but getOptionProperties retrieves properties while getParsedOptionValue retrieves a parsed value.
Both methods interact with Option objects, with hasOption checking for the presence of an option and getOptionProperties retrieving associated properties.
Both methods process lists of values to populate properties, with processPropertiesFromValues being a helper method for getOptionProperties.
